## SfStablecoinStoreState type

Type of [SfStablecoinStore](./lib-base.sfstablecoinstore.md)<!-- -->'s [state](./lib-base.sfstablecoinstore.state.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type SfStablecoinStoreState<T = unknown> = SfStablecoinStoreBaseState & SfStablecoinStoreDerivedState & T;
```
**References:** [SfStablecoinStoreBaseState](./lib-base.sfstablecoinstorebasestate.md)<!-- -->, [SfStablecoinStoreDerivedState](./lib-base.sfstablecoinstorederivedstate.md)

## Remarks

It combines all properties of [SfStablecoinStoreBaseState](./lib-base.sfstablecoinstorebasestate.md) and [SfStablecoinStoreDerivedState](./lib-base.sfstablecoinstorederivedstate.md) with optional extra state added by the particular `SfStablecoinStore` implementation.

The type parameter `T` may be used to type the extra state.
